item.author: fdarma@urnotgettingit.com (fdarma)
item.description:
Albums

  • In Bern - Loren Conners & Jim Oâ€™Rourke music for when I’m not in the mood for music
  • Koko - Keiji Hano also worth listening to 1st - ä¸å¤±è€… [Fushitsusha]
  • Hiroshi Yoshimura - Air falling in love with this again https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ProvVFrF6b8
  • Charles Mingus - Mingus Plays Piano Finally got around to the whole album, more than just myself when I am real
  • Mccoy Tyner - Echoes of a Friend holy shit
  • Beverly Glenn Copeland - Beverly Glenn Copeland if joni mitchell made a proto keyboard fantasies record, gorgeous music
  • Steve Kuhn - Ecstasy Need to find this on searchers https://www.thesearchers.com.au/products/steve-kuhn-ecstasy-lp-album
  • Hiroshi Fukumura - Morning Flight Getting back to Three Blind Mice recordings, real feast for the ears kind of music. Trombone go brrrrrr.
  • joy in fear - goat (jp) ****

Songs

Songs

  • Thom Yorke - Cymbal Rush
  • Tried and True - Ween
  • Radio No.1 - Air Iâ€™ve embarrassingly overlooked other songs from this record
  • Kosuke Mine Quintet â€“ Dream Eyes The closest something has sounded to Miles Davisâ€™ In a Silent Way, compliments donâ€™t get better than that and recordings donâ€™t sound more well produced than this.

Albums

  • Patric Rushen - Straight From the Heart ğŸ™Œ ğŸ˜©
  • Protection - Massive Attack is now my favourite massive attack album, tracey thorn slays
  • One-Room Survival - Serani Poji I hope my Akishibu-kei journey ends here
  • Body Meets Sing - Hi-Posi ã‚ã¨ä½•æ—¥? is a mandatory end of the day song for me, really good for those winter commutes and what a winter weâ€™ve been having
  • Love Changes Everything - Dirty Three so badly wanted to put some summers they drop like flys or indian love song here but I just canâ€™t get over those chords between IV-VI

Songs

  • Cielo Falso - Vidrio more gorgeous with every listen Songs
  • Tant de Belles Choses - FranÃ§oise Hardy In honour of her passing
  • Righteous Life - Sergio Mendes & Brasil 66’ The 66â€™ at their best
  • Electric - The Church Iâ€™ll never sleep on these guys ever again
  • Kiss Her Kiss Her - Blond Redhead haunting way to end the show
  • Oh Bess, Oh Whereâ€™s my Bess - Miles Davis
  • Ember Days - The Lemon Twigs

item.author: fdarma@urnotgettingit.com (fdarma)
item.description:
Albums

  • Alone - Bill Evans You really feel like he could go on forever
  • Piano Works Volume 1 - FranÃ§ois-JoÃ«l Thiollier, Claude Debussy Iâ€™ve finally found my favourite version of 2 Arabesques: Arabesque No. 1 and my favourite pianist for Debussy compositions. Noriko Ogawa falls just short.
  • Here In The Pitch - Jessica Pratt My most anticipated release of the year and so far my album of the year
  • Lives Outgrown - Beth Gibbons bring out the good headphones for this

Songs
item.content:encoded:
Albums

  • Alone - Bill Evans You really feel like he could go on forever
  • Piano Works Volume 1 - FranÃ§ois-JoÃ«l Thiollier, Claude Debussy Iâ€™ve finally found my favourite version of 2 Arabesques: Arabesque No. 1 and my favourite pianist for Debussy compositions. Noriko Ogawa falls just short.
  • Here In The Pitch - Jessica Pratt My most anticipated release of the year and so far my album of the year
  • Lives Outgrown - Beth Gibbons bring out the good headphones for this

Songs

  • PalhaÃ§o - Egberto Gismonti Contender for favourite songs of all time, linked the live version where Gismonti is at his sweetest. The studio recording to look for is the one off of Circense.
  • 2 Pieces for 6 Hands: No. 2, Romance - FranÃ§ois-JoÃ«l Thiollier, Sergey Rakhmaninov so glad to have found thiollier
  • Caetano Veloso - You Don’t Know Me
